Class AllTests

java.lang.Object
bcu.cmp5332.bookingsystem.test.AllTests
@Suite @SuiteDisplayName("Flight Booking System - All Tests") @SelectClasses({CustomerTest.class,FlightTest.class,BookingTest.class,FlightBookingSystemTest.class,UserTest.class,AuthenticationServiceTest.class,ValidationUtilTest.class}) public class AllTests extends Object
Master test suite that runs all test classes. This suite ensures comprehensive testing of the Flight Booking System. To run all tests, execute this class.
